name: The Relict
description:
This game takes place during two time periods.

1945:

In the death throes of World War II, you are a new recruit who has been put on a special assignment, Operation Viperfrost. The man in charge of this mission is Lt. George Edwards, revered special operations commando, and your older brother. Your mission is to extract a German scientist from a mountain base before the red army can find them.

1973:

Nearly three decades have passed since Operation Viperfrost. You had quite the career as a soldier, and later as a mercenary. A man approaches you in your home with an offer you cannot refuse. Members of a cult have taken over a laboratory near the Chilean Andes. This laboratory has been conducting research that must never make it in to the wrong hands.
